div.bibl: Svenska Tribunen, May 1, 1901. SWEDISH JEWELERS' SOCIETY

body.p: p.11..............The Swedish Jewelers' Society celebrated it's ninth anniversay with an unusually pleasant Family Festival last Sunday at 1416 Montana St. The program of the evening had the following features: Orchestra-music; solos by our well-known country-woman, Miss Elina Malmborg, accompanied by Miss Lanquist; declamation by Frithiof Malmqust, and a talk by Mr.Karl Johanfson.

The festival committee was composed of the Messrs. Karl Johanfson, Eijnar Bagge, and John Olsson. After the distribution of prizes a fine supper was served, after which there was dancing far into the night.
